proof_script:
lemma cong_add_mod[simp]: "[(a mod n) + b = c] (mod n) \<longleftrightarrow> [a + b = c] (mod n)" "[a + (b mod n) = c] (mod n) \<longleftrightarrow> [a + b = c] (mod n)" "[\<Sum>i\<in>A. f i mod n = c] (mod n) \<longleftrightarrow> [\<Sum>i\<in>A. f i = c] (mod n)"
unfolding cong_def
by (auto simp add: mod_simps)
